title: Singing Sands Trail Walking Route

images.title: Calum McRoberts / Edge of Beinn Bhuidhe
images.caption: Edge of Beinn Bhuidhe. A steep sided escarpment overlooking Five Pennies (Cuig Peighinnean; in the foreground), and Howlin (to the left), part of the wider crofting community of Cleadale.

description: This waymarked walk explores the volcanic island of Eigg in the Scottish Inner Hebrides. The walk climbs to Cleadale, Beinn Bhuidhe and Five Pennies with some wonderful views over the surrounding islands. Start off from the ferry terminal and then head north before picking up a circular loop around Cleadale on the northern part of the island. Here you will find some dramatic rock formations You can continue your walking on Eigg by climbing to An Sgurr Eigg , the highest point on the island.
